title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / messy room after lely tape
description: Kim's reaction to the mess in your room after you've listened to tape and he was present etc.

dialogueTree.title: Empathy: "Kim also tries *not* to look at the..."
dialogueTree.text: Kim also tries *not* to look at the pile of tape viscera on the carpet. Or the weird suitcase on the hat rack. Or the potted plant dying in the corner. But it's all just too morbid to ignore.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The man is finding it hard not to t..."
links.text: The man is finding it hard not to trip on the tape -- and not to send any of the bottles rolling across the floor...

links.title: Endurance: "...where unidentifiable sludge make..."
links.text: ...where unidentifiable sludge makes it hard for him to breathe. Smells of vomit in here.

links.title: You: ""You're looking at the destruction?""
links.text: "You're looking at the destruction?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
links.text: He nods.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry for... this.""
links.text: "I'm sorry for... this."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No problem, officer." He takes a s..."
links.text: "No problem, officer." He takes a step toward the door. Like he'd like to leave.

links.title: You: ""I did it -- my way.""
links.text: "I did it -- my way."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see that." He takes a step t..."
links.text: "I can see that." He takes a step toward the door. "You're the RCM's own Soldier of the Apocalypse, aren't you?"

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wonderful," he nods, then looks to..."
links.text: "Wonderful," he nods, then looks toward the exit, longingly.

links.title: You: ""No. I am something *much more*.""
links.text: "No. I am something *much more*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course." He nods, then looks lo..."
links.text: "Of course." He nods, then looks longingly toward the exit.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see that." He takes a step t..."
links.text: "I can see that." He takes a step toward the door. It looks like he'd like to leave now. The atmosphere is oppressive.

links.title: You: ""Got my own little Co Hoi here.""
links.text: "Got my own little Co Hoi here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see that. The potted plant u..."
links.text: "I can see that. The potted plant under the table is a Seraise Fern. They have those in South Safre too. All things considered..." He looks around, as if to check.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not as bad as I thought. Ther..."
links.text: "It's not as bad as I thought. There are no elephant corpses. Should we go maybe?"

links.title: You: ""This is where *the magic* happens.""
links.text: "This is where *the magic* happens."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And by that you mean crimes agains..."
links.text: "And by that you mean crimes against humanity?"

links.title: You: ""Yes. Disco doorgunning villagers.""
links.text: "Yes. Disco doorgunning villagers."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have no idea what that means." H..."
links.text: "I have no idea what that means." He looks toward the exit, longingly.

links.title: You: ""Well, crimes against myself anyway.""
links.text: "Well, crimes against myself anyway."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have no idea what that means." H..."
links.text: "I have no idea what that means." He looks toward the exit, longingly.

links.title: You: ""I defied bourgeoisie morality in h..."
links.text: "I defied bourgeoisie morality in here. Defied it *hard*."

links.title: You: ""This is an expression of *me*. My..."
links.text: "This is an expression of *me*. My individualism."

links.title: You: ""No, I meant disco... never mind.""
links.text: "No, I meant disco... never mind."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know what you meant." He looks t..."
links.text: "I know what you meant." He looks toward the exit, longingly.

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Nod stoically."
links.text: Say nothing. Nod stoically.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He takes a step toward the door. Li..."
links.text: He takes a step toward the door. Like he'd like to leave.
